Text: The Buffalo Germans was an early basketball team formed in 1895 at a YMCA on Buffalo's East Side.
Triplets:<The Buffalo Germans

--------------------
Text: Buffalo Germans:  Team members included Dr. Fred Burkhardt (coach), Philip Dischinger, Henry J. Faust, Alfred A. Heerdt (captain), Edward Linneborn, John I. Maier, Albert W. Manweiler, Edward C. Miller, Harry J. Miller, Charles P. Monahan, George L. Redlein, Edmund Reimann, Williams C. Rhode and George Schell.
